lexUnit.name: jaundice.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: yellowing of the skin due to an excess of bile pigments in the blood

sentence.text: Examination findings were confirmed as was the cholestatic nature of her jaundice , the bilirubin concentration having risen to 243 Âµmol/l ( Fig 2 ) .
